name: Classic Candied Sweet Potatoes
author: MICHELLERENE
summary: This is the classic sweet potato recipe that my grandmother serves each year for Thanksgiving and Christmas. It's very simple, yet each time I make it people rave and ask for the recipe. Embarrassingly simple & quite delicious!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place whole sweet potatoes in a steamer over a couple of inches of boiling water, and cover
Peel, and slice sweet potatoes lengthwise into 1/2 inch slices
Place in a 9x13 inch baking dish
In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter, brown sugar, water and salt
When the sauce is bubbly and sugar is dissolved, pour over potatoes
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, occasionally basting the sweet potatoes with the brown sugar sauce
